snippet.title: Theatre of War 2: Kursk 1943 Official Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description: Theatre of War 2: Kursk 1943 is a new game in the Theatre of War series of tactical World War II titles. The Battle of Kursk lasted for forty nine days, from July 5 till August 23, 1943 and has made its way into history as one of the most crucial conflicts of WWII. It was the last strategic offensive the Germans were able to mount in the east. The resulting decisive Soviet victory gave the Red Army the strategic initiative for the rest of the war.
